question: Which country was the location of the event "May 1998 riots/1998 tragedy"?
explanation: Indonesia was the location of the event "May 1998 riots/1998 tragedy". The May 1998 riots of Indonesia, also known as the 1998 tragedy, were incidents of mass violence, demonstrations, and civil unrest of a racial nature that occurred throughout Indonesia. The riots were triggered by economic problems, including food shortages and mass unemployment. It eventually led to the resignation of President Suharto and the fall of the New Order government.
